alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 12:45PM EDT until March 12 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1145 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bonifay, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chipley, Bonifay, Marianna, Graceville, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Caryville, Westville, Campbellton, Richter Crossroads, Jacob City, Chipley Municipal Airport, Holmes County Airport, Blue Spring, Gritney, Cottondale Airport, Hulaw, Jacobs and Chipola Terrace. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
